this is an ear grabbing song even if

with these spots that i suppose are a

tension to a really nice tight climax
which is a formula the band revisits on
actually a handful of tracks here on the
ending too they kind of love to
incorporate these moments where they
just draw these songs out into these

not every

track where it kind of leaves this album
with a bit of a cold uneventful finish
that's not to say that the song doesn't

this one no reptiles is maybe one of my

chair who can buy a gun i just fear that
once i understand this song
it will in fact just be making fun of me
because sometimes i do feel like a fat

for it i do think again my issues
sometimes those falsettos can be a

the top they're not lazy glazed over

like kind of you know wacky stuff but

beyond that i think a lot of what
everything everything is doing is very
sweet is very accessible and is very fun
and if you love strong intricate

everything everything has a lot going on
for them as well and again catchy tunes
as well i give this record kudos i think
